title: Tomb Raider 2  [PC game]
description:
TOMB RAIDER 2 [EIDOS]
---------------------

Requirements:-
95/98/ME [runs on XP and Vista with the update patch installed],
Pentium 90MHz,
16MB RAM,

Copied DVD-ROM as an image [mdf/mds].

Delivered in rar folder containing:-
1 image file [mdf/mds],
1 text document,
1 update patch to make the game compatible for XP and Vista,
1 short avi video on how to install the game using a virtual machine.

Unrar the folder and mount the image Tr2.mds with a virtual machine to install and play the game, finally run the patch to update the game.

I recommend Daemon Tools virtual machine to mount the image.

I've included a link in the text document to download Daemon Tools.

If you haven't got a rar extractor installed download one from the link below.

I recommend to use 7Zip, once installed simply right click on the downloaded rar folder > 7Zip > extract here.
 <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a>
